full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS SPU GRI 'BAR BA'I KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA NAS BRGYUD PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI SGRUB THABS SPU GRI 'BAR BA'I KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG SANG RANG PHYOGS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS RJE BLA MA'I THUN MONH MA YIN PA 'DI 'DRA YOD BZHIN DU, ,DE LAS ZAB PA'I SENG GDONG MA'I MAN NGAG ZHIG GZHAN DU YOD SNYAM PAS, GZHAN PHYOGS KYI MAN NGAG ZAB ZAB @009B MOR BTAB PA'I SHOG 'KHYER RE GNYIS LA KHYI DANG GLO BA 'PHRAD PA BZHIN 'JUG PA MTHONG ZHING, ,RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG 'DI LA YANG, ,GLONGS BSHAGS, ,BSUN BZLOG ,TSOGS BRGYA, ,ME MCHOD SOGS RNYING LUGS KYI RGYAS 'GE BAS SNA TSOGS PAS SLENG BAR BYED PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG MTHONG NAS, RANG LUGS GTZANG SING NGE BA'I YIG CHA ZHIG 'BRI 'DUN THOG ,NYE CHAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR DU PHA ROL GYI BSAM SBYOR NGAN PA'I MTHU BYAD SOGS KYI LHAS MTSAN BYUNG BA BZLOG PA'I CHED DU, ,SENG GDONG MA DANG, CHA LUGS KHRO RGYAL GTZUG TOR 'BAR BA GNYIS KYIS GTZO BO'I PHYIR BZLOG GI SGRUB PA KHAG 'GA' ZHIG 'DZUG 'DUN SKABS,, ,BKLAG CHOG 'DI LTA BU NYER 'KHOR 'DUG TSUL 'GA' ZHIG GI MOL BRTEN NAS, BTZUN GZUGS ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS RJE LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG, RGYAL DBANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO RKYANG GI SGRUB THABS DANG, ,RDO RJE 'DZIN PA CHOS RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS RNAMS GONG 'OG BSGRIGS TE GZHIS KA AO RGYAN GLING DU MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON GRUB PO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
